summary: This is an email chain from September 2021 within the FBI's New York Field Office regarding a request to locate and turn over any notes or interview notes related to Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell to the Southern District of New York (SONY). The response indicates the sender has zero notes from these matters.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The FBI agent who sent the initial request to the NY-C20 team asking them to check for any notes regarding Epstein/Maxwell to be turned over to SONY.

events.title: Request for Epstein/Maxwell Notes
events.description: An FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office sends an email to the NY-C20 team requesting they check for any random notes or interview notes regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell to be turned over to SONY.

events.title: Response Regarding Notes
events.description: A response is sent stating the sender has zero notes from any Epstein/Maxwell matters.

keyFacts: In September 2021, the FBI's New York Field Office was actively searching for any notes or interview notes related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
The request specifically asked for notes to be turned over to the Southern District of New York (SONY), indicating ongoing legal proceedings.
One respondent explicitly stated they had 'zero notes from any Epstein Maxwell matters'.
The email chain involves the FBI's Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Desk, highlighting the nature of the investigation.
The document reference EFTA00155354 suggests it is part of a larger set of records related to the case.
